about.title: About Me
about.primary: My name is Darnell, I am a Computer Science student at the University of the West Indies and Junior Software Engineer living in the caribbean island of Trinidad, currently learning more each day regarding CS / IT. I am dedicated and eager to learn new things each day, grow my understanding of technology and work towards being a part of something impactful to the world.
about.primary2: With familiarity in languages such as: C++ | C | Python | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | Java | C# | SQL | Kotlin. Knowledge of technologies like: Git / GitHub | Bash | React | Express | Node.js | Android Studio | Firebase | MongoDB | AWS | Linux. And interests in: Full Stack Engineering | UIX Design | Mobile App Development | General Purpose Software / Application Development | Embedded Systems | Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence | Cloud Engineering | DevOps.
about.secondary: I am also an artist and competitive archer for many years!

projects._comment: To add more projects just follow the above format, the code will dynamically create a new object set for the project view
projects.title: My Projects
Tempo
projects.description: This mobile app MVP was not only initially created in 2 weeks to challenge myself but to also act as a way to show my skill in learning new technologies and adapting to the task given to me. This was a good learning experience and reinforced the reason to me as to why we do computer science and technology as a hold, to solve real-world problems. The problem for me was, I no longer had a music app. There were many issues, unused features and ideas.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Interested in working with me? Feel free to send me a message!
